text: The Truce () is a 1974 Argentine romantic drama movie directed by Sergio Renán (who also stars) and was based on the 1960 novel of the same name by Mario Benedetti. It stars Héctor Alterio, Luis Brandoni, Ana María Picchio, Marilina Ross, Hugo Arana and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1975. It was remade in 2003. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 romantic drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Argentine romance movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Renán
title: The Truce (1974 movie)
